events.name: Pride Benediction with Minister Greg Stevens
events.description: Minister Greg Stevens delivers an opening Benediction to kick off Pride at The Estate.

events.name: Intersectionality and Activism Discussion with SoCC
events.description: Kaelea chats with Ivy Valentine to discuss the importance of intersectionality in queer spaces and how that impacts LGBTQ+ activism.

events.name: What Can Satanists Learn from 80's Queer Activism with Rose D'Arc
events.description: Comparing and contrasting the efforts of Satanists to the HIV/Aids activist groups of the 80's.

events.name: Virtual Ballroom with Kaelea Kae & Hadrian Flyte
events.description: Kaelea and Hadrian dish about the significance of ballroom within queer culture and its role in shaping queer activism. They will also explore how ballroom has entered and influenced the mainstream.

events.name: Thot Thoughts and Art with Gloria Gray
events.description: While drawing, Gloria speaks of the trials and tribulations of sex work and everything in-between. A true Stripper philosopher. Wait-- a truly hot stripper philosopher. Well...both.

events.name: Satanic Panic Archive Library
events.description: Browse the archives, courtesy of Grey Faction.
